question-one.answer: Every User can publish a Listing, which will then be displayed to the public. These Listings will be freely accessible to all on the World Wide Web. Before publishing a Listing, you will need to purchase the option to place it on our Website. This can be done from the Profile page, where you can see three purchase options.

question-two.questions: How can I put my Listing on Placifull?
question-two.answer: You need to have an option that allows you to place a Listing. There are three options from which to choose. The first option is a single post. You purchase it and use it whenever it is most suitable to you. This option has no expiry date.The second and third options have an expiry date and limited quantities. These determine how many active Listings you can have with the particular option. Once they expire you can add them again. You can delete them and input them again as many times as you want.

question-three.answer: We use Stripe in order to process the payment. The fields which ask for your card information are components from Stripe, so Placifull does not actuall have the access to your full card information

question-four.questions: My card was charged but nothing purchased?
question-four.answer: In the unlikely event that your card has been charged when nothing has been purchased, please contact us by email or WhatsApp, giving full details. Valid claims will be refunded ASAP

question-five.answer: The Listing will appear for 30 days, unless you have purchased an extended option which allows the Listing to be active beyond 30 days.

question-six.questions: I bought the promoted feature, but do not see my Listing?
question-six.answer: Once you have purchased the promoted option your Listings will have the chance to be displayed on the main page. The system takes all Listings that have the promoted tag added and randomly selects which to display on the screen.

question-seven.questions: How can I withdraw my referral bonus?
question-seven.answer: Once you have reached 25 € you are able to withdraw this from your account. In order to do so, please contact us and we will transfer the money to your bank account
